Dr Kirsty McGhee

Technical and scientific writer specialising in quantum computing software, with a PhD in materials science and photonics.

View the Project on GitHub kirstymcg/kirstymcg.github.io

Research publications

During my PhD, I published several research articles in esteemed, peer-reviewed scientific journals. Here are a select few:

  • McGhee, K. E., et al. Ultrafast Optical Control of Polariton Energy in an Organic Semiconductor Microcavity. Advanced Optical Materials 11, 2300262 (2023). doi:10.1002/adom.202300262 · PDF

  • McGhee, K. E., et al. Polariton condensation in a microcavity using a highly-stable molecular dye. Journal of Materials Chemistry C 10, 4187–4195 (2022). doi:10.1039/D1TC05554B · PDF

  • McGhee, K. E., et al. Polariton condensation in an organic microcavity utilising a hybrid metal-DBR mirror. Scientific Reports 11, 20879 (2021). doi:10.1038/s41598-021-00203-y · PDF

Further publications can be found on my Google Scholar.
